product_name: Patagonia Reversible Flannel Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Patagonia Reversible Flannel jacket offers laid-back style and versatility; it's equally perfect for walks about town or fetching more wood for the fire on blustery days. The flannel side offers a time-honored classic look and feel; Patagonia's penchant for quality lets you know it's made to last. Plain-weave recycled polyester side with Durable Waterproof Repellent treatment is water-resistant which makes it great for dog walking or light-duty outdoor chores. Thermogreen(R) 90% recycled polyester insulation provides an added buffer against the cold. 2 on-seam hand pockets and 2 button-flap chest pockets on the flannel side; 1 snap-flap chest pocket on the plain side. Full zipper; hip-length; adjustable double-button cuffs. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Reversible Flannel jacket offers laid-back style and versatility; it's equally perfect for walks about town or fetching more wood for the fire on blustery days.
